author: cms-ngt-hlt
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, add validation (w.r..t SIM) and harvesting step for Phase-2 HLT timing and NGT workflows. 
This would allow to have quickly access to workflows in which we can test changes in the reconstruction (at HLT) and see effects at the validation level, without the need to run (the time expensive) the reconstruction step3. 
The HLT validation procedure is incomplete (see issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39362) but these workflows will also be useful when testing new additions to that. 

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 29634.75,29634.751, 29634.752, 29634.753, 29634.754, 29634.755, 29634.77`
